text:
Film directors Ameer, Karu Palaniappan and S.P. Jananathan coming out of the Vellore Central Prison for Men after meeting Perarivalan, a life convict in the Rajiv Gandhi assassination case on Tuesday . — Photo: C. Venkatachalapathy

Perarivalan, one of the life convicts in the Rajiv Gandhi assassination case, has urged the Chief Minister to grant him parole to visit his 74-year-old ailing father. Film directors who met him urged the CM to grant it:
title: Film directors urge CM to grant Perarivalan parole
